root.name: Complex toolbox
root.description: This plugin provides some useful functions to work with complex-valued sequences.
root.author: ylemontag - Yoann Le Montagner
root.changelog:
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2012-07-10 11:39:21
Fix: begin/endUpdate when allocating a sequence
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2012-06-21 11:51:31
Add: support the Block interface
- Version 0.0.3.0 Date 2012-03-09 18:17:33
Fix: clarify the input variables
- Version 0.0.2.0 Date 2012-03-08 17:34:38
Add: Complex feature extraction can be done either from a complex-valued sequence (with an even number of channels) or from 2 sequences with same size. The latter mode can be used to create complex-valued sequences.
- Version 0.0.1.0b Date 2012-03-08 15:30:39
